meanings: flooding, waterlogging, (formal) inundation, be flooded, be waterlogged, (formal) be inundated

vlive.korean: [추소정 착장 너무 귀여워서 내 눈물로 봉은사로 침수됐으니까 내일도 반바지 입길 바래 소정...] [Chu Sojung's outfit is so cute that I'm crying a river, so please wear shorts tomorrow too...] View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 안녕히계세요 여러분~ 전 행복의 엑떨을 찾아 떠납니다🙋🏻 (Exy&SeolA's song recommendation)
vlive.english: [Chu Sojung's outfit is so cute that I'm crying a river, so please wear shorts tomorrow too...]

vlive.korean: 그 지역이 한동안 침수돼 있었죠. So we had the place flooded for a while. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 마이클 패스벤더 X 캐서린 워터스턴 <에이리언: 커버넌트> V라이브 ' V LIVE'
vlive.english: So we had the place flooded for a while.

examples.korean: The cellar floods whenever it rains heavily. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 지하실은 비만 많이 오면 침수된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cellar floods whenever it rains heavily. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The river burst its banks and flooded nearby towns. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 강의 둑이 터져 인근 소도시들이 침수되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The river burst its banks and flooded nearby towns. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Due to the excessive flooding in our warehouse, some of our inventory was damaged by water. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당사 창고에 물이 범람하여 재고 일부가 침수 피해를 당했습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Due to the excessive flooding in our warehouse, some of our inventory was damaged by water. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The whole district was inundated with water. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 지역 전체가 침수되었다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The whole district was inundated with water. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ground floor flooded twice last summer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 1층은 작년 여름에 두 번 침수되었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ground floor flooded twice last summer. Add to Wordbook
